alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 3:12AM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected along with strong and gusty winds. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight MDT Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...The combination of snow and strong gusty winds will create areas of blowing snow that will result in significant travel difficulties.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
